name: Break (Bernhard Werner)
description:
In this game you shoot a yellow ball around and try to hit all small blue bricks. After you hit all of them, the level is cleared.

The fewer shots you need the more star points you earn; up to 2 per level. How many shots you are allowed to need for the first and second start point, respectively, is indicated at the top. The more star points you have, the more levels are unlocked.

And after a while new objects than just bricks will appear...

-----

Please note, that this game is build and optimised to be played on a smartphone. The mouse controls on the desktop versions make the game significantly easier. And the embedded web version is a bit buggy...
